summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding a financial matter involving a bond that was not transferred. Richard Kahn requests assistance in looking into a $3,000,000 bond from Excela that was supposed to be transferred to Schwab.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is requesting assistance regarding a financial issue related to a bond transfer.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is copied on the email regarding the inquiry into the bond transfer.

locations: 575 Lexington Avenue, 4th Floor, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: Richard Kahn is inquiring about a $3,000,000 bond from Excela.
The bond was supposed to be transferred to Schwab but has not been.
The email is marked as confidential.
